thread.title: Avanthika Mohan to do a cameo role in TV serial
thread.title_full: Avanthika Mohan to do a cameo role in TV serial - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Avanthika Mohan to do a cameo role in TV serial
text:
Avanthika Mohan, who debuted through Yakshi Faithfully Yours in Mollywood, will be doing a cameo role for Suresh Unnithan's TV venture.
About her role, she says, "It's a special appearance for few episodes and I play the role of a film actress in the serial." She also clarifies that she took up the role only because Unnithan was associated with the project.
"I made my film debut through Suresh sir's son Abhiram's movie and I couldn't say no," says Avanthika, who will next be seen in a Sandalwood film.
